ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated Thu, 7 Dec 2000 8:51:49 PM Eastern Standard Time, jhenders@... writes:

<< On Thu, Dec 07/00, Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...> wrote:
>
> So what I was wondering is could bards use this knowledge to somehow help us
> survive a fight after we go linkdead.

When charmed you are also an npc, and in all the times my bard was
charmed, which was a lot back in the days when shaman npc mobs could
charm, I never once played a song. The AI doesn't appearantly think
songs are spells.>>

That's Verant for you :-) Even if AI doesn't think a song is a spell in that circumstance, it sure won't let you start a new song when you're stunned. And the system message that pops is "You can't cast a spell when you are stunned." Talk about double standards, lol.
Acelynn Falconsfire
